fn.p: J.L. and Y.S. contributed equally to this work.

Citation Ladau J, Shi Y, Jing X, He J-S, Chen L, Lin X, Fierer N, Gilbert JA, Pollard KS, Chu H. 2018. Existing climate change will lead to pronounced shifts in the diversity of soil prokaryotes. mSystems 3:e00167-18. https://doi.org/10.1128/mSystems.00167-18.
